explains: adj. 无缝的；无缝合线的；无伤痕的
wordGroup: seamless steel pipe 无缝钢管
seamless pipe 无缝管；无缝钢管
seamless steel tube 无缝钢管；无缝套筒
seamless connection 无缝连接；无缝链接

sentences.en: It was a seamless procession of wonderful electronic music.
sentences.cn: 那是一曲流畅美妙的电子音乐。

sentences.en: Some folks view alliances as a blessing to travelers, offering seamless travel, reduced fares and enhanced frequent-flyer benefits.
sentences.cn: 有些人把联盟看作是对旅行者的一种祝福，因为联盟可以提供连贯的旅行、优惠的机票和加强版的常旅客优惠。
